description: This file defines an interface for subtitle extraction from video frames, and a stub implementation simulating on-device inference using a TensorFlow Lite-like approach. It includes a public interface with methods to extract subtitles from a video frame at a given playback position and to release resources, along with a stub class that provides simulated subtitle output based on current playback time.

classes.name: TFLiteSubtitleExtractorStub
classes.description: A stub implementation of the SubtitleExtractor interface that simulates inference output without performing real ML processing. It provides dummy subtitle text at intervals based on the playback time and manages a warm-up state.

methods.name: extractFromFrame
methods.description: Simulates extracting subtitle text from a video frame at a specified playback position, returning different strings based on time intervals or null if not producing output.

methods.name: release
methods.description: Releases or cleans up resources tied to the ML engine; in this stub, it performs no operation.
